pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Vallaris libraryA package to made for support Vallaris MapsNow supported Pythont >= 3.6## How to use
1 Install python >= 3.6
2 Install library vallaris ==> pip3 install vallaris
3 Create User On Vallaris Maps at https://vallarismaps.com/management/signin
4 Example source code at https://repo.i-bitz.co.th/vallaris_example/vallaris-python## Select a file from the code folder.  for data management in Vallaris Maps
- 1 collectionCreate.py ==> for create Collection
- 2 collectionUpdate.py ==> for update Collection
- 3 collectionDelete.py ==> for delete Collection
- 4 featuresCreate.py ==> for create data in Collection
- 5 featuresUpdate.py ==> for update data in Collection
- 6 featuresDelete.py ==> for delete data in Collection
- 7 featuresExport.py ==> for download data in Collection
- 8 vectortileCreate.py ==> for Vector Tile
## Select a file from the code folder.  for create Module processes in Vallaris Maps
- 1 perform.py ==> for write code python
- 2 mockProcess.py ==> for json test for use processes
